nodes.text: The Sunburris cascade was a demonstration starfighter maneuver known to the Jedi Order. A favourite of the Jedi Nib Assek, she led a drift of Jedi Vectors in performing the cascade during the opening ceremony of the Valo Republic Fair.

The Sunburris cascade first appeared in the 2021 novel The High Republic: The Rising Storm, written by Cavan Scott. It shares its name with the Star Wars Legends character Crix Sunburris, a Jedi Master and ace pilot.
